description.h2: XBRL instance, schema, and linkbase documents must be attached to an EDGAR submission using the EX-100.* or EX-101.* document types.
description.p: A single submission must not contain both EX-100 and EX-101 attachments.
All XBRL document types are listed in the table below.
REMARK: This cannot be tested outside of the EDGAR system itself.
REMARK: On variation 002, EdgarLink software already tests for this condition so it is unlikely this could ever come about; it is here in the suite for internal testing.

variation.name: 6.3.2, XFD file uses both EX-100 and EX-101 NOGOOD.
variation.description: XFD file uses both EX-100 and EX-101 NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.3.2, XFD file has a presentation linkbase attached as Cal; NOGOOD.
variation.description: XFD file has a presentation linkbase attached as Cal; NOGOOD.
